comments.body: Duplicating this documentation is weird, as is the place it's located. It seems like neither quickstart nor tutorial should probably go into this much information about the serving formats. Can we put this documentation in some serving-specific location, and have both link to that?
Moved this documentation to the `Built-In deployment tools` section of the documentation and added a `:ref:` link to it in the tutorial.

      with the ``split`` orientation to the pyfunc server. For more information about the input data

      with the ``split`` orientation to the pyfunc server. For more information about the input data
      formats accepted by the pyfunc model server, see the
      :ref:`MLflow deployment tools documentation <pyfunc_deployment>`.

comments.body: Can we sync the language selection for all blocks? I.e. when user clicks R, the rest of the tutorial switches to R.
Yes, I had a mental not for this. It's annoying to have to switch per section. I can also add a `#language=r` or `#language=python` to the URL to be able to share sections in the correct language.
